alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 2:05PM CST until March 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, is for areas of freezing drizzle producing a light glaze of ice accumulation. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Wednesday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Wednesday night to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Western Cherry
